'''ÑGUR''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "death".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 168</ref><ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 377</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Noldorin]] ([[Sindarin]]): ''gûr'' ("death")<ref name=Ety/>
*[[Quenya]]: ''nuru'' ("death")<ref name=Ety/>
